question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding PARIVESH (Pro-Active and Responsive facilitation by Interactive, Virtuous and Environmental Single-window Hub)?
1. It is a Single-Window Integrated Environmental Management System.
2. It strengthens the sustainable development through e-governance.
3. It caters to central, state and district level clearances.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: PARIVESH (Pro-Active and Responsive facilitation by Interactive, Virtuous and Environmental Single-window Hub) is a Single-Window Integrated Environmental Management System. It strengthens the sustainable development through e-governance.Â It caters to central, state and district level clearances.
